Package ohos.ai.cv.docrefine

Class DocCoordinates

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.ai.cv.docrefine.DocCoordinates

  • public class DocCoordinates
extends Object
    A utility class used to store the corner coordinates of the document bounding box.
    Since:
    1

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      DocCoordinates​()
      Default constructor used to create a DocCoordinates instance.
      DocCoordinates​(CvPoint topLeft, CvPoint topRight, CvPoint bottomLeft, CvPoint bottomRight)
      A constructor used to create a DocCoordinates instance based on the corner coordinates of the document bounding box.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      CvPoint getBottomLeft​()
      Obtains the coordinate of the CvPoint data type in the lower left corner of the document bounding box.
      CvPoint getBottomRight​()
      Obtains the coordinate of the CvPoint data type in the lower right corner of the document bounding box.
      CvPoint getTopLeft​()
      Obtains the coordinate of the CvPoint data type in the upper left corner of the document bounding box.
      CvPoint getTopRight​()
      Obtains the coordinate of the CvPoint data type in the upper right corner of the document bounding box.
      void scaleDocCoordinates​(float scale)
      Uses a specified scale to zoom in or out the text border.
      void scaleDocCoordinates​(float scaleX, float scaleY)
      Uses the specified scales to zoom in or out in the horizontal and vertical directions of the text border.
      void setBottomLeft​(CvPoint bottomLeft)
      Sets the coordinate of the CvPoint data type in the lower left corner of the document bounding box.
      void setBottomRight​(CvPoint bottomRight)
      Sets the coordinate of the CvPoint data type in the lower right corner of the document bounding box.
      void setDocCoordinates​(DocCoordinates docCoordinates)
      Creates a DocCoordinates instance by using the corner coordinates of the DocCoordinates data type.
      void setTopLeft​(CvPoint topLeft)
      Sets the coordinate of the CvPoint data type in the upper left corner of the document bounding box.
      void setTopRight​(CvPoint topRight)
      Sets the coordinate of the CvPoint data type in the upper right corner of the document bounding box.
      static ArrayList<Integer> toArrayList​(DocCoordinates docCoordinates)
      Converts a DocCoordinates instance to the corner coordinates of the List<Integer> data type of a text border.
      static DocCoordinates toCoordinates​(List<Integer> points)
      Creates a DocCoordinates instance by using the corner coordinate list of the List<Integer> data type.

                      CvPoint topRight,
                      CvPoint bottomLeft,
                      CvPoint bottomRight)
        A constructor used to create a DocCoordinates instance based on the corner coordinates of the document bounding box.
        Parameters:
        topLeft - Indicates the coordinate of the CvPoint data type in the upper left corner of the document bounding box.
        topRight - Indicates the coordinate of the CvPoint data type in the upper right corner of the document bounding box.
        bottomLeft - Indicates the coordinate of the CvPoint data type in the lower left corner of the document bounding box.
        bottomRight - Indicates the coordinate of the CvPoint data type in the lower right corner of the document bounding box.

      • scaleDocCoordinates

        public void scaleDocCoordinates​(float scale)
        Uses a specified scale to zoom in or out the text border.

        The scale is passed by the caller, and the value range is determined by the variable type.

        Parameters:
        scale - Indicates the scale to zoom in or out.
        Since:
        1

      • scaleDocCoordinates

        public void scaleDocCoordinates​(float scaleX,
                                float scaleY)
        Uses the specified scales to zoom in or out in the horizontal and vertical directions of the text border.
        Parameters:
        scaleX - Indicates the scale to zoom in or out in the horizontal direction.
        scaleY - Indicates the scale to zoom in or out in the vertical direction.
        Since:
        1

        public void setDocCoordinates​(DocCoordinates docCoordinates)

        Since:
        1

      • toCoordinates

        public static DocCoordinates toCoordinates​(List<Integer> points)
        Creates a DocCoordinates instance by using the corner coordinate list of the List<Integer> data type.
        Parameters:
        points - Indicates the corner coordinate list of the List<Integer> data type.
        Returns:
        Returns the created DocCoordinates instance.
        Since:
        1

      • toArrayList

        public static ArrayList<Integer> toArrayList​(DocCoordinates docCoordinates)
